name: Marco
letter: Caro Babbo Natale, sono stato molto bravo quest'anno. Ho aiutato la mamma e fatto i compiti.

name: Sofia
letter: Caro Babbo Natale, ti voglio bene! Quest'anno ho imparato a leggere.

name: Luca
letter: Ciao Babbo Natale, ho fatto del mio meglio a scuola.

name: Giulia
letter: Babbo Natale, sono stata bravissima!

name: Alessandro
letter: Caro Babbo Natale, quest'anno potevo fare meglio ma prometto di migliorare.

name: Emma
letter: Babbo Natale ti amo! Sono stata bravissima tutto l'anno!

name: Matteo
letter: Babbo Natale, ho aiutato mio fratello minore.

name: Chiara
letter: Caro Babbo Natale, voglio diventare un'astronauta!

name: Lorenzo
letter: Babbo Natale, ho fatto tutti i compiti!

name: Aurora
letter: Caro Babbo Natale, quest'anno sono stata abbastanza brava.

name: Emily
letter: Dear Santa, I've been super good this year! I helped my mom every day.

name: Jake
letter: Hey Santa! I did my chores and got good grades.

name: Olivia
letter: Dear Santa, I love you! I shared my toys with my sister.

name: Ethan
letter: Santa, I tried to be good but sometimes it was hard.

name: Ava
letter: Dear Santa, I want to be a scientist! I got straight A's!

name: Mason
letter: Santa, I helped my grandma this year.

name: Sophia
letter: I love you Santa! I was the best girl ever!

name: Liam
letter: Dear Santa, I cleaned my room every week!

name: Isabella
letter: Dear Santa, I love horses! I've been very good.

name: Noah
letter: Santa, I could have been better but I'll try harder next year.

letter: 亲爱的圣诞老人，我今年学习很努力。

letter: 圣诞老人我爱你！

letter: Дед Мороз, я была самой хорошей девочкой!

letter: Дед Мороз, я старался учиться лучше.

letter: Дорогой Дед Мороз, я люблю рисовать!

letter: Дед Мороз, я люблю машины и строить!

letter: Дед Мороз, в следующем году буду лучше.

letter: Papai Noel, eu joguei futebol o ano todo e fui bom aluno!

letter: Papai Noel, eu amo dançar e ajudei mamãe!

letter: Oi Papai Noel, fui bem na escola esse ano.

letter: Papai Noel, eu amo pintar e desenhar!

letter: Papai Noel, eu amo a praia e fui legal com meus amigos!

letter: Papai Noel, ajudei meu irmão com os deveres.

letter: Papai Noel, eu pratico violão todos os dias!

letter: Papai Noel, eu fui obediente esse ano!

letter: Papai Noel, vou me esforçar mais ano que vem.

letter: G'day Santa! I helped out at home all year and got good grades!

letter: Dear Santa, I love animals so much! I've been very good!

letter: Hey Santa, I played cricket all year and did okay at school.

letter: Dear Santa, I believe in magic and I've been kind to everyone!

letter: Santa, I'll try to be better next year, I promise.

letter: Je t'aime Père Noël!
